name: UREA
indications: debridement promotion normal healing hyperkeratotic surface lesions , particularly healing retarded local infection , necrotic tissue , fibrinous purulent debris eschar . urea useful treatment hyperkeratotic conditions dry , rough skin , dermatitis , psoriasis , xerosis , ichthyosis , eczema , keratosis pilaris , keratosis palmaris , keratoderma , corns calluses , well damaged , ingrown devitalized nails .
contraindications: apply urea 40 % affected skin twice per day , directed physician . rub completely absorbed . apply diseased damaged nail ( ) twice per day , directed physician .
warningsAndPrecautions: urea 40 % cream 1 oz . tube ( 28.35 g ) ndc 50268-872-28 3 oz . tube ( 85 g ) ndc 50268-872-85 7 oz . bottle ( 198.4 g ) ndc 50268-872-19 store room temperature 15°c - 30°c ( 59°f-86°f ) . protect freezing . keep bottle tightly closed . tamper evident foil seal cap . foil seal broken missing . keep medications reach children . manufactured : avkare pulaski , tn 38478 www.avkare.com av rev . 6/22 rev . 6/22
indications_original: For debridement and promotion of normal healing of hyperkeratotic surface lesions, particularly where healing is retarded by local infection, necrotic tissue, fibrinous or purulent debris or eschar. Urea is useful for the treatment of hyperkeratotic conditions such as dry, rough skin, dermatitis, psoriasis, xerosis, ichthyosis, eczema, keratosis pilaris, keratosis palmaris, keratoderma, corns and calluses, as well as damaged, ingrown and devitalized nails.
contraindications_original:
Apply Urea 40% to affected skin twice per day, or as directed by your physician. Rub in until completely absorbed.
       
 
  
       
 
   
Apply to diseased or damaged nail(s) twice per day, or as directed by a physician.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Urea 40% Cream
                  1 oz. tube (28.35 g) NDC 50268-872-28
                  3 oz. tube (85 g) NDC 50268-872-85
                  7 oz. bottle (198.4 g) NDC 50268-872-19
                  
                  Store at room temperature 15°C - 30°C (59°F-86°F).
                  Protect from freezing. Keep bottle tightly closed.
                  Tamper evident by foil seal under cap. Do not use if foil seal is broken or missing.
  
                     
                     KEEP THIS AND ALL MEDICATIONS OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN.
                     
                     
Manufactured for:
  
                     
                     AvKARE
                     
                     
Pulaski, TN 38478
 
                  
                  www.avkare.com
  
                     
AV Rev. 6/22 Rev. 6/22
adverseReactions_original: Known hypersensitivity to any of the listed ingredients.
